Description: Bowl. Made of mould-blown and lustred glass.
Bibliographic references: Carboni & Whitehouse 2001 / Glass of the Sultans (cat.109, pp.220-21) (entry by Carboni)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.122, fig.1)
Lamm 1929-1930 / Mittelalterliche Gläser und Steinschnittarbeiten aus dem Nahen Osten (pl.37.9)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2002 20 Feb-15 May, Greece, Athens, Benaki Museum, Glass of the Sultans 2001 17 Sep-2002 14 Jan, USA, New York, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Glass of the Sultans 2001 24 May-2 Oct, USA, Corning, Corning Museum of Glass, Glass of the Sultans
